description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Memorize the sequence of buttons and repeat it in an ever growing chain. Get it wrong and get a surprise.  With 4 different play modes from Easy to Extreme(with only Easy available until purchase), Button Memory can appeal to anyone.  So who can go the longest?!  Is it you?
